channel.title: Help with this command

item.title: Help with this command
item.dc:creator: @akithebest akithebest
item.description:
@akithebest wrote:

how do i make this shit work iv tried evrything i no with javaâ€¦

        if (command.startsWith("freeze") && playerRights > 1) {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(7);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been freezed for using 1-4 items!.");
                    p.sM(
                            "You cant move now for 3 minutes!");
                    p.stillgfx(369);
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try to enter the name that you want to freeze!");
            }
        }
